name: exohistorian
description:
Submitted as part of #fermijam

In the future, droves of exohistorians peruse Earth's galactic neighborhood seeking to find and catalogue other alien civilizations, who appear to have all fallen due to unknown calamities. We follow one exohistorian on their search for artifacts exciting enough to keep their sponsoring museum happy.

CREDITS

Words: Cian Cruise

Code: Dustin Freeman

Music:

Deep Blue - www.bensound.com

Harbinger of Doom - www.purple-planet.com
